description: This file defines the RemotePlugin class within the WPEFramework::Plugin::Rust namespace. It serves as a plugin interface implementation that interacts with Rust code, providing methods for initialization, deinitialization, invocation, and message handling. It also manages internal state related to remote process launching and socket communication.

classes.name: RemotePlugin
classes.description: A plugin class implementing multiple interfaces for remote communication, process management, and web socket handling to facilitate Rust integration within the WPEFramework plugin architecture.

methods.name: RemotePlugin
methods.description: Constructor initializing the RemotePlugin instance with configuration.

methods.name: ~RemotePlugin
methods.description: Default destructor for the RemotePlugin.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns plugin information string.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increments reference count.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements reference count.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the plugin with the given shell.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the plugin.

methods.name: Attach
methods.description: Attaches the plugin to a communication channel.

methods.name: Detach
methods.description: Detaches the plugin from a communication channel.

methods.name: Close
methods.description: Closes a communication channel.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revoke a callback interface.

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a token, method, and parameters.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a method with parameters and handles response.

methods.name: Inbound
methods.description: Handles inbound messages identified by string or ID.

methods.name: onRead
methods.description: Processes a response received from remote.

methods.name: LaunchRemoteProcess
methods.description: Launches a remote process with shared library, IP, and port.

methods.name: SendTo
methods.description: Sends JSON data to a specified channel.

methods.name: WPEFramework::PluginHost::ILocalDispatcher * Local()
methods.description: unavailable
